page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: The area covered by this block includes a wide variety of land uses. This area was once very important not only to Newham, but to London as a result of the Royal Docks. These are now closed and the area has come in for a great deal of redevelopment. Many of the older houses have been replaced with a wide variety of housing from tower blocks to houses and maisonettes. Industry is being encouraged to the area and plannners are at pains to ensure sufficient open space and recreational facilities. As a result of new housing and industry this is one of the few areas of east London to be growing in terms of its population
